item.description:
I've recently decided to get out of my comfort zone to meet some new people, so I joined this meetup group! :D I've also recently learned how to play mahjong too, I wonder if anyone has a set of mahjong so we can indulge in some serious Asian Mahjong fun! :-) (I play Cantonese Mahjong!)

Slight change of plans.

Mah jong first, followed by dinner (optional). Please indicate "mah jong" only if you do not plan to join us for dinner after at Ten-Ichi in Natick or Sichuan Gourmet in Framingham. Ten Ichi is a fairly new Asian restaurant that serves hotpot, sushi, korean & chinese dishes. We will go to dinner around 6:30 pm or so. We can vote on the restaurant choice.

And please change your RSVP if you cannot make it since we have many on the waitlist.

We are all set on mah jong sets and tables (3).

We will have drinks on hand. Please bring a snack if you'd like.

It is open parking at our condo complex. If anyone needs a ride, please indicate that in your RSVP. Someone may be able to give you a ride.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Mahjong (real ones!) please!!
